data.name: The Uncertain: Last Quiet Day Soundtrack and Artbook
data.detailed_description:
Download for free The Uncertain: Last Quiet Day Artbook carefully crafted by our artists and CG artists: Ilya Dykov, Yaroslav Kononenko, Alexander Ivanon and Vladislav Tabachnikov as well as our Soundtrack, composed by Igor "Neither_Am_i" Fomichev, Artem Netyagin and Valentin “H2V” Hocklachev.

The Soundtrack consists of 18 tracks:
  • “Ams 20” (Main Menu Theme)
  • “Sehnsucht” (The Uncertain: The Last Quiet Day Main Theme)
  • Autumn sadness
  • Dark PvV
  • FWITC/FWITC amb
  • KRLSS
  • RX dust
  • Inside apartment
  • Wisp
  • Whispers
  • Submotion ghosts
  • Old T53
  • Port Royal
  • Altered 7l
  • 11Path
  • Dew
  • Do.Al.TKy
  • Abandoned places
